diff_analysis.evidence: In controller.php the OLD code builds the visual editor URL as visualeditor.html?params=... and injects $alt_payload into a single-quoted JS string after only replacing backslashes and single quotes. This is insufficient context-sensitive encoding for JavaScript, so crafted payload parameters can break out of the string and execute arbitrary script in the debugger UI (reflected XSS). The NEW code switches to visualeditor.php and passes $alt_payload without embedding it inside a JS string, removing this XSS vector.
